title: Minty Chocolate Cake Bars
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '225g butter, softened', '4 eggs', '125g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '450g chocolate syrup', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '240g icing sugar', '110g butter, softened', '4 tablespoons creme de menthe liqueur', '170g plain chocolate chips', '90g butter']
